website_summaries.verdict: These popular Birkenstocks provide the quality and style that helped define the brand.
pros: One of the most popular styles by Birkenstock, the Arizonas feature adjustable dual straps and contoured cork footbed that make them practical and versatile for all types of casual outfits and occasions
cons: Some reports of concerns of authenticity
Most men require a break-in period
Sizes typically run large for this style

customer_reviews.title: These look like leather, but are easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I went with the vegan Birkenstock because I'm tough on my shoes, and didn't want leather or suede. These look like leather, but are easy to clean, comfortable, and supportive. They'll be my go-to summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Alisyn

customer_reviews.title: Vegan, durable and stylish? Oh my!
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy I bought these. I was a bit worried to purchase vegan shoes, because the last time I bought vegan sandals they fell apart. Several wears in, these only get more comfortable and are not showing signs of falling apart. 100% would buy again, I'm loving them.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great service, awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with everything about this purchase! The shoes look and fit amazing. I'm a US women's size 8. I ordered the 39N and they fit perfectly. I'm glad I went with the narrow fit. Otherwise I think my foot would have been too narrow for the shoes. The shipping was very fast even with it coming from London to the US. It only took 4 days. The patent leather is a bit more shiny than I anticipated but not a deal breaker. I'm so happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy Combes

customer_reviews.title: Typically Great Birkenstocks and Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I placed my order on January 1st, and these Birkenstocks were at my door on the afternoon of January 3rd. First time I've tried the soft footbed, and so far, they feel great. Can't see any reason why they won't give me years of walking comfort, as all my past Birkies have done. I've been wearing their shoes since I was in college back in the 70s, and as I get older, and my feet have developed issues like plantar faciatis (from wearing other kinds of shoes without great support), it's always a pleasure to slip on a pair of these timeless comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Western Electric

customer_reviews.title: Love my birks
customer_reviews.text: I"ve been wearing birkenstocks for a couple years and love them, but I've had an issue with finding them locally in non-suede lite colors. I was very happy to find these in cream plain leather. Love them and they stay so much nicer looker than the suede ones.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sokoll

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and last forever
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Birkenstocks since the '70s. I don't know how many pairs I have had in this style of sandals and several other styles both in sandals and in shoes. Comfortable and last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Wrong buckle color .
customer_reviews.text: The buckles are gold not silver like the picture shows . I was going to return them but my daughter well she’s 13 I think she just didn’t want to wait for another pair .
customer_reviews.author: deborah harward

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel of these sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of the cork base of these sandals. Had a pair previously and decided to order another. The length fits well, but the heel has been made somewhat narrower than my previous pair which makes them harder to simply slip on. Maybe this is because of the unisex nature of the sandals. But would I buy another pair? The answer is yes!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P. Cannucciari

customer_reviews.title: Love love my berks
customer_reviews.text: Love love my berks. Could not live without them. They are so great for people with plantar fasciitis and other problems. Wish I had found them sooner~!
customer_reviews.author: baw53

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They were a bit scratched up when I got them but they are perfect and they're my hiking sandals so they were doomed anyway. Love love love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REAL BIRKS! SUPER GOOD MATERIALS.
customer_reviews.text: Great birks. My 7th pair. I love them. I own 5 pair of birkenstocks from the actual website and two from amazon. Both pairs I got from Comfort Soles and they're both authentic. Super happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Kristina

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves is Birkenstock. A bit on the expensive side but well worth the money paid. I think he left his old ones on a cruise ship so some room steward is probably running around wearing them!!!
customer_reviews.author: nimthim

customer_reviews.title: Go down a size
customer_reviews.text: love Birkenstocks love the way they feel these however are slightly too large I'd say half a size I would definitely order half a size or a size down
customer_reviews.author: BriWadd

customer_reviews.title: Authentic shoes.
customer_reviews.text: They are Birkenstocks. Wife loves them, replacement for her pair thats 15 years old.
customer_reviews.author: RDR44

customer_reviews.title: great Birkenstocks
customer_reviews.text: Ordered size 39. Great leather sandal. Fits big (width and length). I've ordered size smaller and they fit good, still some room though. These are Unisex but more like mens size. Very good quality leather. I wear 8-8/12 and 38 fits good.
customer_reviews.author: gosia

customer_reviews.title: Great Birks
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Birkenstocks, so I know what style and size work for me and these did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: debmutant

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the narrow since I read women should do this. It makes them kinda snug but they are still new to me. Great looking!
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as always
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic as always. Excellent design, material, details. Fits perfectly. I bought several models and colors because these are unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: PPo

customer_reviews.title: Love my Birks
customer_reviews.text: Fit exactly as I thought they would. Looking forward to a summer where my feet will feel happy.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals, sizing is tricky
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I did end up returning and ordering a larger size. Be aware that you may need to try on a couple different sizes, and that you'll need to factor in if you are going to wear chunky wool socks or not!
customer_reviews.author: Sioux Falls

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, as expected. Arrived within two days, very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: shell67

customer_reviews.title: The footbed is a good fit. Other than that
customer_reviews.text: I think I will have to punch an extra hole in the straps after they wear in a bit. I wear them with socks, but they are not quit secure enough. The footbed is a good fit. Other than that , they are the best sandals I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: and I love them so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of Birkenstock, and I love them so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too wide!
customer_reviews.text: Received these for my daughter as a gift. She has several other pairs . These appear to be wide width even though they were advertised as M. The toe box area is so much larger in comparison to her others.
customer_reviews.author: jkoz

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to a
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a Christmas gift. Recipient was excited to get them. I would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Only shoe I can wear after having plantar fasciitis. Great support and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Sue Zwicker

customer_reviews.title: Super Wide
customer_reviews.text: This style is wider than most others. No, it's not a wide size either.
customer_reviews.author: Velinda Nienow

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock lives up to its reputation.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is perfectly. I didn’t want the vegan version but that was the only one available
customer_reviews.author: Mary S. Goedge

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have a short leg and have the left shoe lifted. I've been wearing these for over 20 years, and this latest version is the most comfortable I've ever owned. No break in period was required. They were comfortable since the first day.
customer_reviews.author: MB01

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my briks
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my briks. These are such a cute pair specially with the patent. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: reina :)

customer_reviews.title: NOT  SOFT FOOTBED!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered soft-footbed arizonas but received the standard footbed. Buy elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Imad

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock soft footbed is a great idea and makes this sandal so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Birkenstock soft footbed is a great idea and makes this sandal so comfortable. Just remember to size down, these sandals do run big.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are just a shinier version of your typical Birks. If you like Birks and want something a bit dressier, these are perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit large but if feels nice on the feet. Hard to precise size when is a product you never owned before.
customer_reviews.author: Joao Carneiro

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Birkenstock’s! They are as comfortable as I remember they were in the 90s!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my daughter. Judging by the picture we thought they were white. They were not. They are a tanish color. We sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Want a refund
customer_reviews.text: Sandal is extremely large/long. I have purchased this brand before and it has always fit. These are too large with snug straps and they do not look well on my foot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: #1 Gourmet
customer_reviews.text: This new pair of Berkenstocks are my # 10 pair.......They're all GREAT !
customer_reviews.author: Donna D. Nannen

customer_reviews.title: Birkenstock shoes
customer_reviews.text: I thought the top would be leather like my last pair so I can't wear them and no longer have the box. I wore them one time. I reacted to the material
customer_reviews.author: Karen Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: These are great for summer or anytime, very comfy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bryon Todd Woytek

customer_reviews.title: German engineering wins again!
customer_reviews.text: Ze Germans got it right many years ago when invented this wonderful form of footwear!
customer_reviews.author: Nita Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandal- Didn't realize it wouldn't be leather because I'm dumb.
customer_reviews.text: So, uh, I was pretty dumb when I ordered this. I was not thinking that vegan = no leather. Sure, I love the environment and animals, but I like the original Birkenstock sandals more than these. At least I will try and make myself think of all the good I'm doing with using these instead. I'm not 100% sure they're authentic just since they're so different.... but I will go with "yes" for now.
customer_reviews.author: EALong19

customer_reviews.title: wrong size, seems to run large
customer_reviews.text: I had to send them back. I got a different style a size smaller and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Fit is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Fit is perfect. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: FeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great product my husband had a pair before so knew ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great product my husband had a pair before so knew what size we needed... he wears a 9 and a 40 is perfect, don't think that meshes with there sizing though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The length was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping they would fit but even having straps on tightest they were still somewhat loose. The length was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Stone

customer_reviews.title: The package was returned to the ups the day of delivery
customer_reviews.text: Look for this package....returned the same day if delivery.....I NEVER ACCEPTED THE PACKAGE THANK YOY
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very wide
customer_reviews.text: The sandal is too wide- unfortunately I am a few days over the return window
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Straps
customer_reviews.text: The straps are a bit tough, and they bite at least for 1-2 weeks, if the base was dust resistant, t would have been excellent. Keeping all that aside, they are very good for your flat feet. Whe I walk in them or stand for long time I them, I keep thinking why I didn't buy them earlier...
customer_reviews.author: Shravan Muppidi

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: That patent leather is stiff and uncomfortable not happy with the sandals
customer_reviews.author: SANDY KALTER

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The description indicated the shoes had the soft foot bed and they did not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were a perfect fit for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: They were a perfect fit for my daughter. She received the shoes for a birthday gift 🎁 and loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Sooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: Like walking on a cloud. Shoe bed is so soft.
customer_reviews.author: Christa A. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessory for large feet
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful for persons with large feet. It is comfortable and can be worn to go everywhere. The material is durable and quite fashionable. Its a winner in my books.
customer_reviews.author: June Alleyne

customer_reviews.title: RUN VERY LARGE. I AM A TRUE SIZE 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: RUN VERY LARGE. I AM A TRUE SIZE 7 AND ORDERED ACCORDING TO THE CHART. THE SHOE WAS 1-1 1/2" TO LARGE FOR MY FOOT. THE QUALITY OF THE SHOE ITSELF SEEMED CHEAP TO WHAT I'VE HAD IN THE PAST SO I WON'T BE REORDERING.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the first time I have had the leather.  It is stiffer than the buck but I lilke the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have many Birkenstock shoes. They are always comfortable. I would like to know where I can get them re-soled.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Heady

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very Good, it is excelent, i recommend them a lot, the price is lower in comparition with the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Madla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were for my wife. She wears them daily and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: David C McClay

customer_reviews.title: I ordered a 38, and got a 39, ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 38, and got a 39, which is too large. After ordering the shoes, i found out that they were being shipped from Germany, and it was over a month before I got them. I was in dire need, as my old ones were falling apart, but i attempted to wear them, but they do not fit right, and sending them back, receiving another pair would have tarn 2 or 3 months, while I was out the money, so I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a black one and it fits and what a great deal it is. If the owner is willing to lower the shipping cost, I will get a pair of white one.
customer_reviews.author: BB and Me

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed about that
customer_reviews.text: When they arrived they were not the soft footbed sandals. As they are a Christmas gift I dont know yet if I will keep them. Very disappointed about that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Birkenstock Unisex Arizona Slide
product_meta.description:
The often imitated, never duplicated, category-defining, two-strap wonder from Birkenstock. A comfort legend and a fashion staple. With adjustable straps and a magical cork footbed that conforms to the shape of your foot, a truly custom fit is as effortless as the classic design.

This is the real deal. Cork, leather, a buckle or two: these are the simple ideas that have made feet happy for over two hundred years, and that's the original Birkenstock. These shoes are made in Germany since 1774. No smoke, no mirrors, and no gizmos are needed. You walk, the shoe molds to your foot. The shape of the Original Birkenstock Footbed enables body weight to be distributed evenly over the whole foot, providing it with optimal support.
feature_bullets: Birkenstock Branding Printed On Outer Side
